total_revenue.context: Revenue toward high end of guidance range, down 5% year-over-year

segments.name: iPhone

revenue.context: Revenue from iPhone segment, down 17% year-over-year

key_points: Declines significantly smaller in final weeks of March quarter
Positive response to pricing actions in emerging markets
Strong trade-in program performance
99% customer satisfaction for iPhone XR, XS and XS Max combined
81% of business buyers plan to purchase iPhones
Record active installed base

segments.name: Services

revenue.context: Best quarter ever for Services, up 16% year-over-year

key_points: Over 390 million paid subscriptions
Double-digit growth across App Store, Apple Music, cloud services
Record quarters for AppleCare and Apple Pay
Apple Pay available in 30 markets
Launched Apple News+, Apple Card, Apple Arcade preview
New Apple TV app and Apple TV+ announced
Services account for 20% of quarterly revenue

segments.name: Mac

revenue.context: Revenue down 5% year-over-year due to processor constraints

key_points: Double-digit growth in Japan and Korea
New all-time Mac revenue records in both markets
Nearly half of purchases from new-to-Mac customers
Record active installed base
Launched new, more powerful iMac

segments.name: iPad

revenue.context: Revenue up 22% year-over-year, highest growth in six years

key_points: Growth in all five geographic segments
Strong response to iPad Pro
Launched new iPad Air and iPad Mini
Over half of purchases from new-to-iPad customers
93% customer satisfaction rating
Record active installed base

segments.name: Wearables, Home and Accessories

revenue.context: New March quarter record, with Wearables growing close to 50%

key_points: Best non-holiday quarter ever for Apple Watch
75% of Apple Watch purchases from new customers
Launched new AirPods with H1 chip
Strong demand for AirPods
Business approaching Fortune 200 company size

gross_margin.context: Company gross margin in line with guidance

strategic_initiatives: Expansion of Apple Pay to 40 markets by end of year
Launch of new services: Apple News+, Apple Card, Apple Arcade, Apple TV+
Expanded trade-in and financing programs globally
ECG app expansion to Hong Kong and 19 European countries
Green bond allocation across 40 environmental initiatives
Expansion of recycling programs with Daisy robot
Partnership with 44 suppliers for clean energy transition

market_opportunities.services: Growing paid subscriptions expected to surpass 500 million during 2020

market_opportunities.healthcare: Expansion of health records on iPhone, partnership with VA

market_opportunities.enterprise: Growing adoption in aviation and large enterprise platforms

market_opportunities.environmental: Exceeding goal of 4 gigawatts renewable energy in supply chain by 2020

introduction: Revenue at $58 billion, toward high end of guidance
Best quarter ever for Services at $11.5 billion
iPad revenue up 22%, highest growth in six years
Improved year-over-year performance in Greater China
services: Launched Apple News+, Apple Card, Apple Arcade preview
Apple Pay expanding to 40 markets by year end
New Apple TV app launching in mid-May
products: iPhone declines smaller in final weeks of quarter
Launched new iPad Air and iPad Mini
New AirPods with H1 chip seeing incredible demand
ECG app expansion to more countries

introduction: Revenue near high end of guidance at $58 billion
Set new March quarter record for Wearables
Best iPad growth in six years
